text: Sodium iodate is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is NaIO3. It has sodium and iodate ions in it. == Properties == Sodium iodate is a colorless solid. It is similar to sodium chlorate. It is a strong oxidizing agent. It reacts with sodium hypochlorite to make sodium periodate. It can catch things on fire. == Preparation == It is made by dissolving iodic acid or iodine in sodium hydroxide solution. Iodine dissolving also makes sodium iodide. == Uses == It is used to make sodium periodate. == Related pages == *Potassium iodate *Potassium periodate *Potassium chlorate Category:Potassium compounds Category:Iodine compounds
title: Sodium iodate
